name: Tramploline
description:
This game is based on a viral video that involved some YouTubers who threw cars and other objects on a trampoline. Play the game by clicking in the object you want in the game, and the magnet will release the object above the trampoline in the game. You can adjust the gravity acceleration and the objects' mass so you can see how the items will behave on another planet, perhaps.

You can see the video here->
